mapper.select: select app_id, app_name, short_name, app_url, icon, status, app_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_app_config where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_app_config (app_id, app_name, short_name, app_url, icon, status, app_type, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark) values (#{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
